facility.description: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
All inclusive with alcoholic drinks top brands
No hen/stag or any other parties allowed
Children share the bed with parents
Towels and bed linen at surcharge
Marriage certificate required for a couple to share room
Children get free accommodation, meals payable on the spot
Credit card is compulsory as a deposit, no deposit in cash is accepted
Towels and bed linen at surcharge
